title: 旧约 - 箴言(Proverbs) - 第 11 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 箴言(Proverbs) -- 第 11 章 ( 本篇共有 31 章 )

lineList.en: A false balance is abomination to the LORD: but a just weight is his delight.
lineList.cn: 诡诈的天平，为耶和华所憎恶。公平的法码，为他所喜悦。

lineList.en: When pride cometh, then cometh shame: but with the lowly is wisdom.
lineList.cn: 骄傲来，羞耻也来。谦逊人却有智慧。

lineList.en: The integrity of the upright shall guide them: but the perverseness of transgressors shall destroy them.
lineList.cn: 正直人的纯正，必引导自己。奸诈人的乖僻，必毁灭自己。

lineList.en: Riches profit not in the day of wrath: but righteousness delivereth from death.
lineList.cn: 发怒的日子，赀财无益。惟有公义能救人脱离死亡。

lineList.en: The righteousness of the perfect shall direct his way: but the wicked shall fall by his own wickedness.
lineList.cn: 完全人的义，必指引他的路。但恶人必因自己的恶跌倒。

lineList.en: The righteousness of the upright shall deliver them: but transgressors shall be taken in their own naughtiness.
lineList.cn: 正直人的义，必拯救自己。奸诈人必陷在自己的罪孽中。

lineList.en: When a wicked man dieth, his expectation shall perish: and the hope of unjust men perisheth.
lineList.cn: 恶人一死，他的指望必灭绝。罪人的盼望，也必灭没。

lineList.en: The righteous is delivered out of trouble, and the wicked cometh in his stead.
lineList.cn: 义人得脱离患难，有恶人来代替他。

lineList.en: An hypocrite with his mouth destroyeth his neighbour: but through knowledge shall the just be delivered.
lineList.cn: 不虔敬的人用口败坏邻舍。义人却因知识得救。

lineList.en: When it goeth well with the righteous, the city rejoiceth: and when the wicked perish, there is shouting.
lineList.cn: 义人享福合城喜乐。恶人灭亡，人都欢呼。

lineList.en: By the blessing of the upright the city is exalted: but it is overthrown by the mouth of the wicked.
lineList.cn: 城因正直人祝福便高举。却因邪恶人的口就倾覆。

lineList.en: He that is void of wisdom despiseth his neighbour: but a man of understanding holdeth his peace.
lineList.cn: 藐视邻舍的，毫无智慧。明哲人却静默不言。

lineList.en: A talebearer revealeth secrets: but he that is of a faithful spirit concealeth the matter.
lineList.cn: 往来传舌的，泄漏密事。心中诚实的，遮隐事情。

lineList.en: Where no counsel is, the people fall: but in the multitude of counsellors there is safety.
lineList.cn: 无智谋，民就败落。谋士多，人便安居。

lineList.en: He that is surety for a stranger shall smart for it: and he that hateth suretiship is sure.
lineList.cn: 外人作保的，必受亏损。恨恶击掌的，却得安稳。

lineList.en: A gracious woman retaineth honour: and strong men retain riches.
lineList.cn: 恩德的妇女得尊荣。强暴的男子得赀财。

lineList.en: The merciful man doeth good to his own soul: but he that is cruel troubleth his own flesh.
lineList.cn: 仁慈的人，善待自己。残忍的人，扰害己身。

lineList.en: The wicked worketh a deceitful work: but to him that soweth righteousness shall be a sure reward.
lineList.cn: 恶人经营，得虚浮的工价。撒义种的，得实在的果效。

lineList.en: As righteousness tendeth to life: so he that pursueth evil pursueth it to his own death.
lineList.cn: 恒心为义的，必得生命。追求邪恶的，必致死亡。

lineList.en: They that are of a froward heart are abomination to the LORD: but such as are upright in their way are his delight.
lineList.cn: 心中乖僻的，为耶和华所憎恶。行事完全的，为他所喜悦。

lineList.en: Though hand join in hand, the wicked shall not be unpunished: but the seed of the righteous shall be delivered.
lineList.cn: 恶人虽然连手，必不免受罚。义人的后裔，必得拯救。

lineList.en: As a jewel of gold in a swine's snout, so is a fair woman which is without discretion.
lineList.cn: 妇女美貌而无见识，如同金环带在猪鼻上。

lineList.en: The desire of the righteous is only good: but the expectation of the wicked is wrath.
lineList.cn: 义人的心愿，尽得好处。恶人的指望，致干忿怒。

lineList.en: There is that scattereth, and yet increaseth; and there is that withholdeth more than is meet, but it tendeth to poverty.
lineList.cn: 有施散的，却更增添。有吝惜过度的，反致穷乏。

lineList.en: The liberal soul shall be made fat: and he that watereth shall be watered also himself.
lineList.cn: 好施舍的，必得丰裕。滋润人的，必得滋润。

lineList.en: He that withholdeth corn, the people shall curse him: but blessing shall be upon the head of him that selleth it.
lineList.cn: 屯粮不卖的，民必咒诅他。情愿出卖的，人必为他祝福。

lineList.en: He that diligently seeketh good procureth favour: but he that seeketh mischief, it shall come unto him.
lineList.cn: 恳切求善的，就求得恩惠。惟独求恶的，恶必临到他身。

lineList.en: He that trusteth in his riches shall fall; but the righteous shall flourish as a branch.
lineList.cn: 依仗自己财物的，必跌倒。义人必发旺如青叶。

lineList.en: He that troubleth his own house shall inherit the wind: and the fool shall be servant to the wise of heart.
lineList.cn: 扰害己家的，必承受清风。愚昧人必作慧心人的仆人。

lineList.en: The fruit of the righteous is a tree of life; and he that winneth souls is wise.
lineList.cn: 义人所结的果子，就是生命树。有智慧的必能得人。

lineList.en: Behold, the righteous shall be recompensed in the earth: much more the wicked and the sinner.
lineList.cn: 看哪，义人在世尚且受报，何况恶人和罪人呢。
